events.name: Siege of Frilp
description: The **Siege of Frilp** lasted for months against **The Voiceless Ones**.

events.name: Brewinger's Revenge
description: After blowing up the location of one important facility, he hired bounty hunters to kill the PCs, ISB or not!

events.name: Brewinger's Bounty
description: After the attack on them by Reeda, Undrake put a bounty on Brewinger, which was last seen as _pending approval_.

organizations.name: EdG
description: _Les Enfants du Grabuge_ (a.k.a. EdG), which means _Children of Mayhem_, is a powerful criminal syndicate that operate primarily in the Outer Rim. They are affiliated with the Hutts.

organizations.name: Naarlock's pirates
description: Evil pirates with a skull in front of a highly-modified Nebulon-B Frigate, what can go wrong?

organizations.name: Silver Sun Mining Company
description: The company was founded 195 years ago by Daniel Jones. At the time, its main business was mining blaster gas extract, with 30 employees headquartered in a well-maintained office.
The company's first main breakthrough was figuring out a method to produce durasteel 25% faster than the competition.

metadata.Logo Features: An ivory planet and a silver sun

Headquarter.name: Space Station SSMC-1
description: The Space Station is orbiting the Gas Mines of Endium in the corporate sectors
The CEO Tom Krenik was removed from office after the PCs found that he was conspiring with the Rebel Alliance.
The rebel base is built inside an old Silver Sun Mining Company's mine.

organizations.name: Rebel Alliance
description: The Rebel Alliance is a stateless interstellar coalition of republican dissidents, revolutionary factions and anti-imperialist clandestine cell systems in a resistance movement against the imperialist Galactic Empire. The Alliance's goal is to restore the Galactic Republic.

races.name: The Voiceless Ones
description: **The Voiceless Ones** represent a remote empire that span multiple sectors on the border of the known galaxy.

storylines.name: Naarlock's pirates
description: They like to pillage, steal, and blow things up! The New Order wants to stop them from terrorizing the outer rim.

storylines.name: The Rebels of Admiral Zryv'yhx
description: The empire is against a dangerous cell of rebels.
The Overwatch destroyed their base and most of their fleet.

storylines.name: The Alchemists
description: This could be the guy that made the poison that killed Dargon's wife!

storylines.name: The Invisible Beast
description: Rebels wants and are studying invisible beast and their habitat.

gm-notes: The piece of armor acquired by Undrake that he identified as some Voiceless Ones technology.

storylines.name: The Cryptic text
description: After investigating a file that turned out to be a cryptic message, Undrake and the Chiss Initiative are looking into the possibility of finding a legendary artifact or a mythical temple.

gm-notes: The Dark Character landed on the base with shock troops to find another pieces of the old-jedi device.

description: Undrake and Daasir were tasked of bringing back an important artifact that Hublin was investigating. One of the slave was the former owner of the artifact.

storylines.name: The Dark Character
description: A Dark Imperial Character seems to give force power from time to time to **Jenssar**. He seems highly ranked and interact mostly with the Grand Moff, the Grand Admiral and the GRand General of the area.

storylines.name: Grace Gray
description: Grace Gray is the sister of Phobe Gray of the Silver Sun Mining Co. She's the one that invited Jenssar to race in the galactic semi-pro race. Jenssar, in his free time, spend time with her helping her and her Repulse-o-ski team.

squadrons.name: Phantom
description: Infamous rebel heavy fast attack starfighter squadron lead by **Bonkers**.

squadrons.name: Banshee
description: The newest rebel squadron, lead by **Juno Eclipse**, that made a name for themselves in the past few months.

squadrons.name: Acers
description: The legendary interceptor rebel squadron lead by **Rush**.
The Acers escorted the boarding ships, and Rush's A-Wing was disabled by Jenssar during the fight, making her and her modified ship disappear in the Bancroft Nebula.
